|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 09/09/2009 |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = 710931600612 |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = B002IW7ARY |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = Taiwan
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1cpu = true |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |rad1txchains = 2 |rad1rxchains = 2 |rad1sstreams = 2 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |rad1n = 300 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4
|wi2_if_name = |rad2chip1 = Ralink;RT2880; |rad2chip2 = Ralink;RT2850; |rad2oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad2_ant_conn = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |rad2txchains = 2 |rad2rxchains = 2 |rad2sstreams = 2 |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11a/n |rad2n = 300 |rad2a = 54 |rad2freq = 5
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== The device shares the same hardware as the [[EnGenius ESR7750|Senao / EnGenius ESR7750]]. As such, the FCC ID of that device has been assigned to this entry.
"7016A0266000 V1.00" is silkscreened on the board.
Note: This device uses the RT3052 as the main processor. The RT2880 is operating in '''iNIC''' mode (operating as a NIC remotely via its MII interface).
The default SSIDs for the device are '''TRENDnet671A''' and '''TRENDnet671N'''.
The included power adapter is a '''AMIGO''' AMS6-1201000SU (12V, 1A).
==Pictures== <center>'''User Images''' <gallery mode="slideshow"> File:TRENDnet_TEW-671BR_board_top.jpg|board top </gallery></center>[[Has images::internal| ]]
